case.name: Sebel Furniture Limited v Acoustic & Felts Pty Limited (No 2) [2009] FCA 291 (1 April 2009)

citances.sentence: As will be apparent from the judgment which I delivered a short time ago ( Sebel Furniture Limited v Acoustic & Felts Pty Limited (No 2) [2009] FCA 291) , my associate was notified yesterday afternoon that the applicant would seek leave to discontinue all of the claims previously made by it, with the exception of those set out in subparagraphs 3(a), 3(b) and 3(c) of the Amended Application filed on 23 December 2008.
